text:
- We started the journey
to move to the cloud

five years ago when we
committed to go all in with AWS,
and we're actually at the finish line.
We are closing our last data center.

Moving to the cloud has
actually enabled quite a bit
of success for us.
Our journey started with moving

our central reservation
system to the cloud.

We're the first major
hotel company to modernize

and build an entirely purpose-built
in the cloud on Amazon.

And then from there, we started
our modernization journey
and committed to being all in with AWS
as the first hotel company to do that.

And since then, we've
just innovated nonstop.

Recently, we introduced a new
technology called Choice Max,

which is the first-of-its-kind
mobile technology
around revenue management,

and really helps our
franchise owners optimize

their pricing strategies and
optimize their profitability.

Something that we're passionate
about at Choice is obviously

taking care of our
environment and doing that,
everything from how you operate the hotel,

to how we manage our
workloads in the data centers.
So finishing our journey, migrating out

of our last data center,
moving all in on AWS is helping
us on part of that journey.

I think what's next for
Choice is really to leverage
and harness the power of data.

We've got a lot of the
building blocks in place.

We've got a lot of the
cloud technology in place.

We've modernized and
we moved to the cloud.

Now we need to harness and
unleash more power to our guests.
(upbeat music continues)
